name: Nyam Candy Cat
description: Embark on an exciting adventure as a daring flying cat in a whimsical world of candy skies. Test your skills by dodging a barrage of candies on your journey, and see how long you can last before your cat hero runs out of lives. But fear not, for with a sprinkle of magic, you can make all the candies disappear and continue your journey unimpeded!
